'''Michael Alan ("Mike") Foster''' (d. [[April 12]], [[2023]]<ref>[[Amon Hen 301]], Page 33</ref>) was a retired Professor in English at [[Wikipedia:Illinois Central College|Illinois Central College]].<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.linkedin.com/pub/prof-mike-foster/47/a42/73a|articlename=Prof. Mike Foster|dated=|website=[http://www.linkedin.com/ LinkedIn.com]|accessed=19 May 2013}}</ref> He had been the North American representative of [[The Tolkien Society]] since 1995, and taught a course on [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] at Illinois Central College from 1978 until 2005.<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.tolkiensociety.org/ed/courses.html|articlename=Courses on Tolkien's Literature|dated=2006|website=[http://www.tolkiensociety.org/ TolkienSociety.org]|accessed=19 May 2013}}</ref>
